title: 127 - Bill Wastes Hundreds Of Dollars On NFT's
description: On today's show, the boys chat about a number of things including Billy Tubes deciding to spend $700+ on Logan Paul's NFT Pokemon collection, Mitt puking in his mouth at a barbershop after a rough Friday Night, Lyle Lovett conceding that Tony Digs is the only Covid Cowboy, how awesome the new Godzilla v. Kong movie is going to be, what shows the guys have been bingeing as of late, and much more as they dive into an absolutely LOADED Pod Fod. We appreciate the hell out of you guys for listening, send in your submissions to be featured on the Pod Fod and give us some ideas for a new bracket to replace March Sadness. We'll see you on Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
